edu.rit.pj2

Class TupleSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.TupleSpace

  • public class TupleSpace
extends Object
    Class TupleSpace provides tuple space for a PJ2 Job. Tuple space is the repository for the Tuples that the Job's Tasks use to communicate and coordinate with each other.

    Normally, user programs do not call methods directly on a tuple space object. However, a class implementing interface Rule.Matcher does call methods on a Transaction object to find target tuples that match the rule's template tuples and remove the matching tuples from tuple space.

    To put a tuple into tuple space, call the putTuple() method.

    To remove tuple(s) from tuple space, call the getTransaction() method to get a Transaction object, then use the transaction object to find and remove the desired tuple(s).

    Tuple space is locked while a tuple is being put. Tuple space is locked while a transaction is in progress, from when the transaction is created until when the transaction is committed or aborted. If tuple space is locked, the putTuple() and getTransaction() methods will block until tuple space is unlocked.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TupleSpace.Transaction
      Class TupleSpace.Transaction provides a transaction for finding and removing Tuples from TupleSpace.
      static class  TupleSpace.TupleRef
      Class TupleSpace.TupleRef provides a reference to a tuple in tuple space.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TupleSpace

        public TupleSpace()
        Construct a new tuple space.

    • Method Detail

      • putTuple

        public void putTuple(Tuple tuple)
        Put the given tuple into this tuple space. The putTuple() method will block until no other putTuple() method call is in progress and no transaction is in progress.
        Parameters:
        tuple - Tuple.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if tuple is null.

      • getTransaction

        public TupleSpace.Transaction getTransaction()
        Get a transaction for finding and removing tuples from this tuple space. The getTransaction() method will block until no putTuple() method call is in progress and no other transaction is in progress.
        Returns:
        Transaction.

      • allTuples

        public AList<Tuple> allTuples()
        Get a list of all tuples in tuple space.
        Returns:
        List of all tuples.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Remove all tuples from tuple space.
